title: Little golden memories
creator_credit: Jim Bousman and Western Publishing Company
brief_description: Stories from twelve of the best loved Little Golden Books. - Poky little puppy and the patchwork blanket. - Theodore Mouse goes to sea. - Tawny scrawny lion. - Sailor dog. - Rupert the rhinoceros. - Jack and the beanstalk. - Saggy baggy elephant. - Little toad to the rescue. - Scruffy the tugboat. - Three Billy Goats Gruff. - Little Red Riding Hood. - What was that?
